name: Thomas Schreiber
background: Thomas Schreiber serves as Programme Director, ARD at ARD (Das Erste). Focus areas: Overall editorial direction for ARD's factual output. They are looking for: Premium factual content that fulfills ARD's public service remit with journalistic excellence. Overall network strategy: ARD seeks high-quality documentary and specialist factual content that explores important social, political, and cultural topics with depth and journalistic integrity while reflecting the diversity of German society.
thematic_priorities: Commissioner-specific: Premium factual content that fulfills ARD's public service remit with journalistic excellence
Feature-length documentaries (45–90 minutes) with journalistic integrity
Investigative documentaries uncovering important social and political issues
Social documentaries reflecting diverse perspectives on contemporary German society
Character-driven documentary series that illuminate broader social issues
Strong emphasis on diverse voices both on-screen and in production teams
Historical documentaries connecting Germany's past to present issues
Science documentaries that make complex topics accessible to broad audiences
Cultural documentaries exploring German arts, music, and literature
Preferred format: Singles (45–90 minutes) or documentary series (3–5 episodes)
target_audience: Broad German audiences; international co-pro potential as appropriate

additional_info.commissioning_cycles: Ongoing; submissions accepted year-round unless strand-specific
additional_info.strategic_shifts: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach
additional_info.diversity_inclusion: Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen
additional_info.regional_production: Support for projects from across German regions (where applicable)
additional_info.independent_production: Open to pitches from independent producers/companies
